endpoints.description: Create a new medical appointment for a patient with a specified practitioner.
Retrieve a list of all scheduled appointments for a particular patient or practitioner.
Update the details of a specific appointment using its unique ID.
Cancel a medical appointment by its ID.
Retrieve a list of all available healthcare practitioners within the network.
Retrieve the available time slots for a specific practitioner.
Add or update the availability schedule for a specific practitioner.
Retrieve the appointment history for a specific patient.
Retrieve a list of available types of medical appointments.
Generate a detailed report summarizing appointments and availability for a specified timeframe.
